name: thunderously
content:
thunderously adverb
(LOUDLY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
extremely loudly: The audience burst into thunderously appreciative applause. My heart began to beat thunderously.
More examplesFewer examplesShe slapped her hand thunderously down on the counter.At the end of the speech, several people rose from their seats and applauded thunderously.The sound of the machine echoed thunderously in my ears.The outgoing president was thunderously cheered at the end of her speech.
